categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "517" was an individual who served the Galactic Empire aboard its first Death Star battle station. Even as Luke Skywalker and Han Solo were infiltrating the station to try and free Princess Leia Organa from Detention Block AA-23, "517" was asked to report to scanner control.
The first and only mention of "517" was in the 1977 film Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope.
